fullText: This parade of odd plot points and narrational perplexities passes quite swiftly — perhaps, at little more than two hours, too swiftly, as the story is hard to follow and harder to swallow.

the story is hard to follow and harder to swallow
passes quite swiftly — perhaps, at little more than two hours, too swiftly

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic finds fundamental problems with the story's coherence and believability, describing it as confusing and implausible, which are serious structural criticisms that make recommendation difficult. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses significant criticism of the plot's coherence and quality, indicating a clear negative sentiment overall.
